Returns:
the byte array
Throws:

validateVersion

protected static boolean validateVersion(java.lang.String version)
Validate a version string. Format: [0-9]+(\\.[0-9]+)*

Parameters:
version - the version to check
Returns:
true if it is a valid version number, false if not

compareVersion

public static long compareVersion(java.lang.String version1,
                                  java.lang.String version2)
Compare version1 and version2. Format: [0-9]{1,3}(\.[0-9]{1,3})*

Parameters:
version1 - version string
version2 - version string to compare to
Returns:
0 if two version are equal, > 0 if version1 is larger than version2, < 0 if version1 is smaller than version2
Throws:
java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - version string is not a valid format

truncateFolder

public static boolean truncateFolder(java.io.File directory)
Remove all folders and files in the directory. (The directory will not be removed)

Parameters:
directory - the directory to truncate
Returns:
true if all folders and files has been removed successfully, false if failed to remove any

truncateFolderRecursively

Remove all folders and files in the directory. (The directory will be removed) It is used by truncateFolder(java.io.File).

Parameters:
directory - the directory to truncate
Returns:
true if all folders and files has been removed successfully, false if failed to remove any

rsaEncrypt

public static byte[] rsaEncrypt(java.security.interfaces.RSAPrivateKey key,
                                int blockSize,
                                int contentBlockSize,
                                byte[] b)
Do RSA encryption and return the encrypted data.

Parameters:
key - the RSA private key
blockSize - the block size, it should be key size (in bits) divided by 8
contentBlockSize - the content block size, it should be key size (in bits) divided by 8, then minus 11
b - the data to encrypt
Returns:
the encrypted data

rsaDecrypt

public static byte[] rsaDecrypt(java.security.interfaces.RSAPublicKey key,
                                int blockSize,
                                byte[] b)
                         throws javax.crypto.BadPaddingException
Do RSA decryption and return the decrypted data.

Parameters:
key - the RSA public key
blockSize - the block size, it should be key size (in bits) divided by 8
b - the data to decrypt
Returns:
the decrypted data
Throws:
javax.crypto.BadPaddingException - b is not a valid RSA encrypted data with the key

getAllFiles

public static java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.io.File> getAllFiles(java.io.File directory,
                                                                       java.lang.String rootPath)
Search through the directory and find all sub-folders, files and those in its sub-folders recursively. This function will skip when there is not enough right to access the folder.

Parameters:
directory - the directory to search through to get files
rootPath - the path to use to replace the map key in return result
Returns:
a map with the key be the relative path of the file to the directory (start with "/") and value be the file

                                  java.io.File file2)
                           throws java.io.IOException
Compare the content of two files byte by byte.

Parameters:
file1 - the first file
file2 - the second file
Returns:
true if the content of two files are identical, false if not
Throws:
java.io.IOException - error occurred when reading the file1 or file2
